name: Cycle for Gold
description:
You are an Olympic cyclist participating in the track cycling event. Your aim to to win the race and get a gold medal.

Controls

Accelerate your bicycle by pressing A & D / Left & Right arrow.

Buttons at the bottom of the screen and an audio cue tell you when to press the button. The better your timing, the more speed you get per press.

Pressing the wrong key lowers your speed.

The tempo of the rhythm changes with your speed.
